Class BonjourBrowserMultiServiceListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • BonjourBrowserMultiServiceListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.apple.dnssd.BaseListener, com.apple.dnssd.BrowseListener

    public class BonjourBrowserMultiServiceListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.apple.dnssd.BrowseListener
    Class for implementation of a listener for general service advertisements. Discovers service types available on the network using the meta-query.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BonjourBrowserMultiServiceListener(BonjourBrowserInterface browser)
      Constructs a new BonjourBrowserMultiServiceListener.

      Called when a service type is discovered.
      void serviceLost(com.apple.dnssd.DNSSDService browser, int flags, int ifIndex, java.lang.String serviceName, java.lang.String regType, java.lang.String domain)
      Called when a service type is no longer available.
      void stop()
      Stops browsing for services and releases resources.

      • BonjourBrowserMultiServiceListener

        public BonjourBrowserMultiServiceListener(BonjourBrowserInterface browser)
                                   throws com.apple.dnssd.DNSSDException
        Constructs a new BonjourBrowserMultiServiceListener. Implements a listener for general service advertisements.
        Parameters:
        browser - BonjourBrowserInterface instance of the browser (must not be null)
        Throws:
        com.apple.dnssd.DNSSDException - if browsing fails to start
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if browser is null

        serviceFound in interface com.apple.dnssd.BrowseListener
        Parameters:
        browser - DNSSDService instance
        flags - flags for use
        ifIndex - interface index
        serviceName - the service type name (e.g., "_http")
        regType - the registration type (e.g., "_tcp.local.")
